articles.title: Did Edison accidentally make graphene in 1879? - Ars Technica
articles.description: Rice University chemists replicated Thomas Edison's seminal experiment and found a surprising byproduct.

articles.title: TikTok users freak out over app’s ‘immigration status’ collection — here’s what it means - TechCrunch
articles.description: TikTok users are freaking out over a mention of "immigration status" data collection, but lawyers explain the disclosure is related to state privacy laws.
articles.content: With the change in TikTok ownership, TikTok users in the U.S. are collectively freaking out over the company’s updated privacy policy after being alerted to the changes through an in-app message. The… [+8136 chars]

articles.author: Rebekah Jordan
articles.title: NASA reveals huge clue about medical emergency behind historic ISS evacuation - UNILAD Tech
articles.description: NASA has revealed a major clue behind the medical emergency that forced an early evacuation of the ISS earlier this month.
articles.content:
NASA has dropped a huge clue about the medical emergency that triggered its ISS evacuation.
A 'serious' medical situation that cut short a space mission and brought four astronauts home early has le… [+2936 chars]
